Plot: The story of a family in Waco, Texas in 1956. The eldest son witnesses the loss of innocence and struggles with his parents' conflicting teachings.
Title: The Tree of Life
Actors: Brad Pitt, Sean Penn, Jessica Chastain, Hunter McCracken
tomatoConsensus: Terrence Malick's singularly deliberate style may prove unrewarding for some, but for patient viewers, Tree of Life is an emotional as well as visual treat.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 101 wins & 108 nominations.
